resources.string:
Hi, my name is Kimberly. 

I am 47yrs old and a single mom of three kid and two grandchildren with another on the way. 

I also have a cat named Tigger and a German Shepard named Mocha. 

I am currently a cocktail waitress at a major casino, but after 20 years ready for a new career. 

I am enrolled in college working towards my associate degree in computer programming. 

I am taking this course for one of my classes toward my computer programming degree. 

I am looking forward to graduating in the Spring. 

I will then continue my education at another college. 

I am looking forward to be able to start a new career in this field of, computer programming.
